verses.name: Psalms 119:9
verses.text: Wherewithal shall a young man cleanse his way? by taking heed thereto according to thy word.

verses.name: Psalms 119:10
verses.text: With my whole heart have I sought thee: O let me not wander from thy commandments.

verses.name: Psalms 119:11
verses.text: Thy word have I hid in mine heart, that I might not sin against thee.

verses.name: Psalms 119:12
verses.text: Blessed art thou, O Lord: teach me thy statutes.

verses.name: Psalms 119:13
verses.text: With my lips have I declared all the judgments of thy mouth.

verses.name: Psalms 119:14
verses.text: I have rejoiced in the way of thy testimonies, as much as in all riches.

verses.name: Psalms 119:15
verses.text: I will meditate in thy precepts, and have respect unto thy ways.
